bio:
Chelsea Cardinal is a multidisciplinary artist and the founder of Studio of Chelsea Cardinal, a graphic design shop working across the print and digital realms. The studio prizes variety and flexibility and can change size and shape as neededâ€”assembling collaborators or liaising with existing teams case by case. Projects have ranged far and wide from book covers to film set graphics, experimental magazines, custom typography and illustration.

Before embarking on her studio practice in 2015, Chelsea worked in editorial design, cultivating her visual storytelling craft and a talent for pairing language and image to great effect. Today, the studio is guided by an ethos of observation and inquisitiveness, and an embrace of all things unconventional.

Services:
Art Direction, Print Design, Editorial Consulting, Brand Identity, Packaging, Product Development, Web

Contact Studio of Chelsea Cardinal
